word_mean: 分解代谢，异化(作用)：生物体将物质转变成为排泄的化合物的任何破坏性代谢过程

sentence.Network_en: A second experiment was designed to look for signs of catabolism.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二个设计的实验是企图寻找分解代谢的迹象.

sentence.Network_en: But this kind of catabolism mainly concentrates on the banana skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 而这种分解代谢主要集中在香蕉皮上.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To investigate the effect of morphine on purine nucleotide catabolism and the mechanism.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 研究吗啡依赖及戒断对嘌呤核苷酸分解代谢的影响与作用机制.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...代谢的基础，是在将电子从还原剂(电子供体，electron donor)到氧化剂(电子受体，electron acceptor)的流动过程中获取能量。因此，作为电子供体的化合物既用作分解代谢(catabolism)中获取能量的还原剂，也用作合成代谢(anabolism)中生物合成的还原剂。化能合成生物的电子供体和受体对反应所放出的能量必须至少高于一个质子穿过细胞膜所需.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek katabolē 'throwing down', from kata- 'down' + ballein 'to throw'

means.word_mean: 1. breakdown of more complex substances into simpler ones with release of energy
